description.value: You've perfected the art of convincing others to see things your way. You can use [[/act make-an-impression skill=business-lore]]{Business Lore} or [[/act make-an-impression skill=corporate-lore]]{Corporate Lore} to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Make an Impression] and, on a success or critical success, you shift your target's attitude one step higher. Whether or not Make an Impression is successful, the target becomes temporarily immune to Sales Pitch for 24 hours.
